# Upgrade Plan

## Overview
Upgrade to latest LTS versions (Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4).

## Tasks
See tasks.json for detailed task breakdown.

## Details
This plan upgrades the Java project to:
- Java 21 (latest LTS version)
- Spring Boot 3.4
- Spring Framework 6.x
- jakarta.* namespace (if migrating from javax.*)

The upgrade will ensure the project builds successfully and passes unit tests.
